transcript: I was like, what? Just like, you know, you didn't get in. Totally plays it off. Like, I didn't get in. And I'm like, I start almost crying.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And I was like what? She's like, you know, you didn't get in. Totally plays it off. Like I didn't get in. And I'm like, I start almost crying.
